title: [Plains of Bone, Outer Circle]
description: Several sconces line this section of the inner wall.  Two of the sconces still hold torches, both in need of replacement that would be useful in the dark.  Sharpened bones cap both walls, serving as deterrents to climbing either wall.

Several sconces line this section of the inner wall.  A few have become homes for families of birds.  Two of the sconces still hold torches, both in need of replacement.  Sharpened bones cap both walls, serving as deterrents to climbing either wall.
